name: European Sponsorship Association
goal: ESA is the voice of the sponsorship industry in Europe. It seeks to inspire, educate and raise standards within the sponsorship industry. As a membership association it strives to lead the industry through activities relating to policy and governance, corporate responsibility, education and training, provision of information and networking.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Public Health, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Best practice and self regulation in audio visual and marketing related activities

Participation in sport

Promotion of arts and culture
